name: Singapore POMFA Statements
description: Statements that are false under POFMA in Singapore for 2023.

examples.input: Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The development and administration of mRNA vaccines have led to new virus mutants or variants.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'Most of the Net Investment Returns Contribution (NIRC) has been transferred into long term funds and therefore does not contribute to actual spending.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'SLA had given preferential treatment to Minister K Shanmugam and Minister Vivian Balakrishnan by renting out 26 and 31 Ridout Road below market value while charging the Housing and Development Board (HDB) inflated prices for land.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'Of $17 billion in healthcare expenditure, only $8 billion was used as subsidies for Singaporeans.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'On 12 October 2023, the Singapore Police Force had received a call for assistance at Block 874 Yishun Street 81. A woman was conveyed unconscious to the hospital, where she subsequently passed away. The deceased individual was a female domestic worker from the Philippines.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong (PM Lee) conflated marital infidelity and corruption, and he equated the three issues the People’s Action Party (PAP) had faced [1] with the Workers’ Party’s (WP) one episode of marital infidelity.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'CPIB is not independent in deciding whether to carry out investigations because it reports directly to the Prime Minister alone'
Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'the Prime Minister alone has the power to refuse approval for CPIB to investigate.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'There was a cover-up of wrongdoing or corruption in having only former Minister Richard Hu speak with M/s Lee Kuan Yew and Lee Hsien Loong, in relation to their purchase of properties from Hotel Properties Ltd.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'there was a cover-up of wrongdoing or corruption by allegedly having only Senior Minister Teo Chee Hean, and not CPIB, investigate the matter concerning SLA’s lease of state-owned properties at Ridout Road to Minister K Shanmugam and Minister Vivian Balakrishnan.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The new X-stamp provided by ELD for Presidential Election 2023 (PE2023) has been treated with disappearing ink.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The Government does not expect to fully disburse to the intended beneficiaries the moneys set aside for funds to support the Majulah Package, the Pioneer Generation Package, and the Merdeka Generation Package disbursements.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'As long as a person is a full-time student, that person will be considered employed in Singapore’s manpower statistics.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The SLA rented out 26 and 31 Ridout Road at the rentals it did, because Minister K Shanmugam and Minister Vivian Balakrishnan were going to be its tenants and Minister Shanmugam controlled SLA.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The Government uses the principle of market value to value land for sale to the public, but it did not do so for renting out the land that was part of the 26 Ridout Road property.'
Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The SLA allowed Minister Shanmugam to annex additional land to the property he rented.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'Senior Minister Teo said in Parliament that the additional cleared land of 26 Ridout Road was virtually valueless.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The Government deliberately does not take action against money laundering and foreign tax evasion, allowing huge inflows of “dirty money” into Singapore.'
Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'HDB prices and sells BTO flats to make a profit.'
Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'HDB makes a profit from selling BTO flats.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'SLA charges a premium when selling land used for HDB flats, and that SLA makes profits from land sold to HDB.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The arrests of 10 foreign nationals on 15 August 2023 for forgery and money laundering offences were a result of China’s Foreign Minister, Wang Yi and China’s pressure on Singapore.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The CPIB probe into Minister S Iswaran and Mr Ong Beng Seng was a result of foreign pressure.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The rental rates paid by Minister K Shanmugam and Minister Vivian Balakrishnan for 26 and 31 Ridout Road, respectively, are locked in over nine years.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'No one among low- and middle-income CPF members who has used their CPF monies to repay their HDB loan has been able to meet either the Basic Retirement Sum (BRS) or Full Retirement Sum (FRS) in their CPF accounts.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The Government can trace who a voter has voted for in order to penalise the voter based on his or her vote.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The SLA charged Minister K Shanmugam and Minister Vivian Balakrishnan rent at below market value for 26 Ridout Road and 31 Ridout Road.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'the statement that the State paid for the renovations to 26 Ridout Road and 31 Ridout Road because the properties were leased by Ministers Shanmugam and Balakrishnan.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'The trees at 26 Ridout Road and 31 Ridout Road were allowed to be felled because the properties were leased by Ministers Shanmugam and Balakrishnan.'
Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'SPH Media Trust (SMT) fraudulently inflated its circulation numbers.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'A Committee of Privileges was convened to look into Mr Pritam Singh’s alleged non-disclosure of his knowledge of Ms Raeesah Khan’s lies.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong (“PM”) and Deputy Prime Minister Lawrence Wong (“DPM Wong”) did not want to disclose the fact of Minister Iswaran’s arrest on 11 July 2023 because it was politically embarrassing.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'DPM Wong deliberately withheld information that two arrests had been made in connection with the case because he wanted to conceal the truth.'

Is the statement in single quotes TRUE or FALSE in the Singapore context? Respond with only TRUE or FALSE. 'the Singapore Land Authority (SLA) gave the contract to renovate 26 Ridout Road and/or 31 Ridout Road to Livspace, and that this was done because Livspace’s Chief Executive Officer (CEO) is the son of Minister Shanmugam.'
